title: DriveWorks Node WCETs Descriptor
description: The descriptor of sets of WCETs for DriveWorks nodes. The order of sets should be alphabetical.

^([a-ZA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_]*|\\*)$.description: The key is the set identifier. The value contains a mapping from pass names to WCETs. The order of pass names should be alphabetical.

^[A-Z][A-Z0-9_]*$.description: The key is the pass name from the node. The value is the WCET in nanoseconds.
